meanings.definition: To see or predict the future using a crystal ball or other object.
meanings.sent1: She scried the crystal ball to learn about her future.
meanings.sent2: The fortune teller scried the future for her clients.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as they scried into a toy magic ball, trying to predict their next playdate.
meanings.sent4: Her intuition scried the upcoming storm in the dark clouds gathering overhead.
meanings.sent5: The ancient wizard scried the destiny of the kingdom in the shimmering waters of the enchanted pond.
